data.name: Jerome Marshall
data.shortIntroduction: I build things for mobile and the web.
data.introduction: I am an accomplished Full-Stack Developer with a strong focus on Front-end technologies. My expertise lies in crafting scalable and user-centric digital experiences. Presently, I hold the role of Software Engineer at Starberry, where I continue to excel in my field.
data.about:
Hello! My name is Jerome, I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in Android and Web Development started back in 2017 when I decided to create a meme app — turns out a meme app taught me a lot about development and digital experiences. 

Fast-forward to today, I've had the privilege to train myself in various bleeding-edge technologies to create amazing digital experiences. Currently, I'm working at Starberry as a Software Engineer.
data.contactText: Currently, I'm looking forward to challenging opportunities and I'm open to your call! My mailbox always welcomes your interest. I’ll try my best to get back to you!

attributes.name: HL Costing
attributes.shortDescription: I'm leading the development of this web application using Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.js. This app is designed for Hydrolines to generate quotes and pricing with just a few clicks.

attributes.name: Netberry
attributes.shortDescription: Developed web application for Starberry, streamlining site and Netlify account management, reducing the Devops team effort by 40%. Added key features like environment access, manual builds, cache clearing, deployment cancellation, and site favoriting, saving 2 hours daily on debugging and troubleshooting.

attributes.name: Portfolio
attributes.shortDescription: A single-page application where you can know more about me and my career.

attributes.name: Zero Hub
attributes.shortDescription: A Facebook clone, replicated the front-end and the back-end using the MERN stack.

attributes.name: Crypto 2k18
attributes.shortDescription: A native android application that I developed for an event in my UG. Has a custom-built UI with many cool animations.

attributes.name: Chord Book
attributes.shortDescription: A cross-platform (hybrid) mobile app which shows the musical chords of songs. This app is beautifully designed with the Neumorphic design system.

quotes.quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Websites promote you 24/7: No employee will do that.
quotes.author: Paul Cookson

quotes.quote: No one comes to your website to be entertained. They have questions they think you can answer. Content answers questions.
quotes.author: Jay Baer

quotes.quote: Your website is the window of your business. Keep it fresh, keep it exciting.
quotes.author: Jay Conrad Levinson

jobs.workDescription:
• Design and develop web applications, primarily serving clients in the Real Estate domain.
  • Collaborate closely with the design team to deliver pixel-perfect UI and exceptional UX.
  • Architect and develop Content Management Systems (backend) for web applications.
  • Collaborate with fellow developers to troubleshoot bugs and maintain web applications.
  • Partner with the SEO team to maximize optimization and search engine rankings.
jobs.name: Starberry

jobs.workDescription:
• Wrote and executed DMLs (mostly SQL) to correct defects and remove blocks from the application
  • Worked with Jenkins and Git Version Control Systems to correct defects push changes to UAT and prod CI/CD pipeline of the application
  • Worked closely with the client to understand their problems with the application and provide solutions at the earliest possible
  • Completed a hands-on three-month training, trained in various technologies such as Java, Spring, Bootstrap, Docker, AWS
jobs.name: Cognizant

jobs.workDescription:
• Worked with a team of three software engineer interns and two engineers to design and develop a cross-platform commercial mobile app using the Flutter framework
  • Architected the application as a whole and implemented various features of the application
  • Designed and implemented a user-friendly UI and design system that provided a convenient user experience to the end-user
  • Single-handedly implemented the Login/SignUp authentication system of the application
jobs.name: Web Me Secure
